Robe of Calius the Druid

armor (lvl 8 - unique)

item id [id]: 240
armor id [armor]: 231 (Heavy Magic Robes)
protection, body [protbody]: 4
magic resistance [mr]: +3
resist fire [fireres]: +10
resist cold [coldres]: +10
resist shock [shockres]: +10
water breathing [waterbreathing]: 1
stealth bonus [stealthb]: +20

Requires 15N to forge (N3)

This robe was created by Calius to protect him from magic and all of the Elements. As a side effect, this also enabled him to breathe underwater.
